caption.p: Western blotting analysis of the levels of Survivin, XIAP, Bcl-2, and P-gp, in HL-60R cells. The cells were treated for 24 h with E. intisy essential oil (25 μg/mL). On the left, the results of a representative experiment; on the right, the results expressed as mean ± standard error of three experiments. Differences when treatments are compared to the control: ** p < 0.01, * p < 0.05 (Tukey’s test).
